item.description:
Come check out the show. It's at 8 pm (doors open at 7:30) at Mottley's comedy club near Faneuil Hall.
______
A Night of Oral (tradition) takes us back to where it all began. A peaceful and happy time before humans learned how to write. Performers come to the stage to share true unscripted stories from their lives about love, triumph, failure, happy accidents, family, and more. Hosted by comedian, Jess Sutich, who weaves it all together with her own tales for a fun and revealing night of stories.

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group
